structure.unit: STATE LIBRARIES -- LIBRARIANS -- STATE ARCHIVES AND RECORDS

text.section: The head of each state and local agency shall establish and maintain an active, continuing program for the economical and efficient management of the records of the agency.

law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 9, effective January 1, 2015. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 53. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 28.

metadata.lrc-note: (1/1/2015). 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 10 provided that "the provisions of this Act shall not impact the provisions of KRS 61.870 to 61.884." That proviso applies to this statute as amended in Section 9 of that Act.
